resources.string: Ahhhh! OH NO A BIG RAT! The Quest never told you how big it was!

From the shadows emerges a scruffy, rough looking man. He looks down at the slain rat and his eyes begin to fill with tears. He wipes them roughly away with one dirty hand and coughs. "What have you done to Muffin? He was my only friend. You will pay for what you did!"
You have completed the Quest. Please select your reward.
